name: Family Fortunes
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

You can now play everyone's favourite family quiz game anywhere anytime with Vernon Kay as your host: can you predict what 100 people thought were the best answers to startling questions?
  • Answer 2,000 questions from the Family Fortunes Surveys!
  • Virtual Vernon Kay hosts your games
  • Exciting game for the whole family: everyone can play!
  • Have fun with the Single, Double and Big Money rounds.
  • Multiplayer mode: challenge a friend to play against you!
